about_the_game: This DLC unlocks the 18+ Adult Content for "Space Detective: The Case of the Rebel Robot". In this DLC, expect to see lesbian sex scenes that include both images of lesbian women having sexual and romantic relations and a tasty tale telling of the action!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features lesbian sexual and intimate intercourse in the form of graphic and story content.
